Articles.Content:
Then no life possibly.

What if people didn't assume that every brony is a guy?

Then history would be rewritten

What if KSP never existed?

Then we wouldn't be here, and I wouldn't be the same person I am now. Notably, I would still suck at orbital mechanics.

What if I stopped posting in all the forum games I've been soiling up contributing to?

Then we'd all miss the other lassie in these parts

What if I suddenly stopped posting? (hint: sun would be happy)
then sun would make a cake out of maud and eat it then die. what if sun died?

It's just a temporary statement from a subjective scaled P.O.V. , relativly & unrelatively important.

What if we do not need Hollydais here or elsewhere as exemple?

I have no idea

what if the world exploded

We would all bleed to death, since our skeletons would be pushed against the ground really fast and hard.

What if I am typing this post while stuck in mud?

Then you would be owning a laptop or mud container.

What if Sun started selling mud containers?

It may appear like a clayfighter reboot from supernes ...

What if rainbowtrout try a cloudy avatar ?

Then community miss rainbowtrout's old avatar.

What if I did my homework instead of posting to the forums?

You'd actually pass.

What if I was in school?

Then you wouldn't be able to post on the forums from a computer at your desk.

What-if.xkcd.com?

Yep, sure enough.

What if I made more tea?

You'd be moar happy (because moar tea = moar boost(ers)?)

What if this was a corrupt thread and this thread's government was corrupt?

Then there would be a government in the first place. also, it'd be locked.

H3ll0. N1c3 d@y w3r.3 h@v1ng.

Edited September 20, 2014 by Souper
forgive me jesus, for i have sinned.

no what if detected........... EROREROR 404 NO WAHT IF SELF DESTTTRRRUCCTTTT\

what If super had actually posted a what if

Then you would not have used error 404.

What If People Stopped Complaining About Capitalized Letters?

then the world would be nice....

what if kerbals landed on earth?

Then they would be killed, taken to area 51, dissected and studied.

What if you had the opportunity to save those poor kerbals?

then I would.

what if humans landed on kerbin?

Then, per the usual progression of that kind of plotline, you would incur the wrath of the US military, which would try to shoot you and take the kerbs back. Of course, you would probably also gain mega-OP powers that would let you fight off the army buffoons, and the kerbals would build hilarious contraptions to attack the military / escape Earth and return to the Kerbol system on their KSPI starship.

What if I wore lipstick today?

then I have no idea.

what if humans landed on kerbin

What GreeningGalaxy said applies to your question.

What if you didn't say the same question twice?

Then there's no luck to find an alternative may be better answer.

What if it was simply complex ?
